Make it Monday 4.6.20 - Easter Egg Bird Treats
Make it Monday 4.6.20 - Adriene Byron photo journal
Myah, 3rd grader and Rocco, 8th grader doing their homework
Today’s art class results from the Ellerbruch house. Tristan (9th grade), Evan (6th grade) and Avery (3rd grade) and mom, Diana Ellerbruch.
Collin relaxing today. He is a 4th grader in Mrs. Brazie classroom.
Abby, a freshman working on Miss Ford’s English assignment.
Damon, Mrs.Petos class and Zoey, Miss Taylor Class Watching caterpillar life cycle to butterfly.
Staying Connected What school looks like at home for Lucy! Utilizing that homemade slant board.
Tristan Ellerbruch starting seeds for the garden. The beginning of a photo log for Intro to Ag.
Norah in Mrs. Peto’s Kindergarten class is making thank you cards for the cafeteria staff... thanking them for the lunches!
Carmen (Mrs. Suydam’s pre k) hard at work.
Norah (Mrs. Peto’s Kindergarten) hard at work.
Ava in Mrs. Peto’s Kindergarten busy doing her schoolwork
